title: Ni engah chuan kalin eng ropuiah chuan
lyrics:
Ni engah chuan kalin, eng ropuiah chuan,
Zing engmawi nuamah leh zan dai tlak hunin;
Muang taka kal zelin ni tinin zui rawh;
Kawng tinah Isua zui rawh.

Zui rawh, kei pawh ka zui ang a,
Zui rawh, ni tinin zui rawh;
Zui rawh, a hruai ang zel chein,
Kawng tinah Lal Isua kan zui ang.

Ni a en lai tak leh zan thim hnuaiah pawh,
Thal khaw eng mawi nuam leh par mawi vulnaah,
Chhandamtu kohna chu hriain awih thuai la;
Kawng tinah Isua zui rawh.

Ni eng mawi nuamah leh khaw dur thim hnuaiah,
Thlipui a hran lai leh a reh lai pawhin,
Ama chakna ringin, ni kin ni thlengin,
Kawng tinah Isua zui rawh.
